backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor with a runPreflightChecks function that always traps due to unsupported preflight behavior.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing feature evidence, affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence for deployment diagnostics and preflight validation features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style list of frontend file paths paired with short human-written summaries for reference.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the frontend app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/scripts/ic-preflight.mjs: Node-based IC project preflight script verifying required files, dfx.json validity, and frontend/backend structure.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React UI showing login flow, identity status, assistant intro, and initialization logs.
frontend/src/deploy/DeploymentDiagnostic: React error boundary that logs detailed initialization/render errors and shows a fallback UI.
Helper that validates backend actor connectivity and handles expected Motoko trap from runPreflightChecks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches the backend actor based on identity and refreshes dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and provider for Internet Identity login, state management, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Hook running runtime preflight checks using the backend actor for deployment diagnostics.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines extensive OKLCH-based color variables for light and dark themes, applying global border, background, and text styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and an Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom OKLCH color tokens, extended animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animation.
